North_Little_Rock.Bragg Guesthouse: The Bragg Guesthouse is a historic house at 1615 Cumberland Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a barn, built in 1869, that was converted about 1925 to serve as a guesthouse for the Bragg family, and represents a fine local example of Colonial Revival architecture. Its structure is post-and-beam timber (cypress) framing, and its exterior is vertical board siding.
